Package interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui

Class DiagramController

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.DiagramController

  • public class DiagramController
extends java.lang.Object
    A class of diagram controllers for managing subwindows within a diagram window.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DiagramController​()
      Initialize this new diagram controller without any subwindows and without any recording.
      DiagramController​(boolean record)
      Initialize this new diagram controller without any subwindows.

    • Method Summary

      Terminate the current editing session, if any.

      Activate the subwindow at the given x and y.

      Adds a message to the active subwindow from the given start coordinate to the given end coordinate.
      void addParty​(int x, int y)
      Add a new party to the active subwindow at the given x and y coordinate.

      Append the given char to the current edit session.

      Close the subwindow at the given coordinates.

      Creates a new subwindow with default parameters.

      Removes all components in the current selection from this controller's diagram.

      Display the currently active subwindow of this diagram controller.

      Returns whether or not the active subwindow is currently editing a component.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiagramController

        public DiagramController​()
        Initialize this new diagram controller without any subwindows and without any recording.

      • DiagramController

        public DiagramController​(boolean record)
        Initialize this new diagram controller without any subwindows.
        Parameters:
        record - If a recording session is to be used.

    • Method Detail

      • toggleActiveSubWindowView

        public void toggleActiveSubWindowView​()
        Toggle the diagram view in this controller's active subwindow

      • displayAllSubWindows

        public void displayAllSubWindows​()
        Display all subwindows in this diagram controller.

      • displayActiveSubWindow

        public void displayActiveSubWindow​()
        Display the currently active subwindow of this diagram controller. This method can be used to improve performance if nothing but the contents of the active subwindow was changed.

      • getActiveSubwindow

        public SubWindow getActiveSubwindow​()
        Get the currently active view of this diagram controller.
        Returns:
        The diagram view of this controller that's currently active.

      • createSubWindow

        public void createSubWindow​()
        Creates a new subwindow with default parameters.

      • duplicateSubWindow

        public void duplicateSubWindow​()
        Duplicate the currently active subwindow.

      • activateSubWindow

        public void activateSubWindow​(int x,
                              int y)
                       throws NoSuchWindowException
        Activate the subwindow at the given x and y.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate at which the subwindow lies.
        y - The y coordinate at which the subwindow lies.
        Throws:
        NoSuchWindowException - If no subwindow lies at the given coordinates.

      • closeSubWindow

        public void closeSubWindow​(int x,
                           int y)
                    throws InvalidCloseWindowException
        Close the subwindow at the given coordinates. The given coordinates should lie within the subwindow's close button.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate for the subwindow.
        y - The y coordinate for the subwindow.
        Throws:
        InvalidCloseWindowException - When the given coordinates don't lie in any subwindow's close button.

      • moveSubWindow

        public void moveSubWindow​(int fromX,
                          int fromY,
                          int toX,
                          int toY)
                   throws InvalidMoveWindowException
        Move the active subwindow from the given coordinates to the given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        fromX - The start x coordinate for the move.
        fromY - The start y coordinate for the move.
        toX - The end x coordinate for the move.
        toY - The end y coordinate for the move.
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveWindowException - The resize operation was not successful.

      • resizeSubWindow

        public void resizeSubWindow​(int fromX,
                            int fromY,
                            int toX,
                            int toY)
        Resize the active subwindow from the given coordinates to the given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        fromX - The start x coordinate for the resize.
        fromY - The start y coordinate for the resize.
        toX - The end x coordinate for the resize.
        toY - The end y coordinate for the resize.
        Throws:
        InvalidResizeWindowException - The resize operation was not successful.

      • addParty

        public void addParty​(int x,
                     int y)
              throws InvalidAddPartyException
        Add a new party to the active subwindow at the given x and y coordinate.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate for the new party.
        y - The y coordinate for the new party.
        Throws:
        InvalidAddPartyException - The operation was not successful.

      • addMessage

        public void addMessage​(int fromX,
                       int fromY,
                       int toX,
                       int toY)
                throws InvalidAddMessageException
        Adds a message to the active subwindow from the given start coordinate to the given end coordinate.
        Parameters:
        fromX - The start x coordinate for the add.
        fromY - The start y coordinate for the add.
        toX - The end x coordinate for the add.
        toY - The end y coordinate for the add.
        Throws:
        InvalidAddMessageException - The operation was not successful.

      • selectComponent

        public void selectComponent​(int x,
                            int y)
        The x & y coordinates of the component.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the component that is to be selected.
        y - The y coordinate of the component that is to be selected.

      • switchTypeOfParty

        public void switchTypeOfParty​(int x,
                              int y)
        Switches the type of the party at the given coordinate, or null if there is none.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate for the party.
        y - The y coordinate for the party.

      • moveParty

        public void moveParty​(int fromX,
                      int fromY,
                      int toX,
                      int toY)
               throws NoSuchPartyException,
                      InvalidMovePartyException
        Moves the party at the given start coordinates to the given end coordinates.
        Parameters:
        fromX - The start x coordinate for the add.
        fromY - The start y coordinate for the add.
        toX - The end x coordinate for the add.
        toY - The end y coordinate for the add.
        Throws:
        NoSuchPartyException - If there is no party at the given start coordinates.
        InvalidMovePartyException - If the party could not be moved to the given end coordinates.

      • deleteSelection

        public void deleteSelection​()
        Removes all components in the current selection from this controller's diagram.

      • isEditing

        public boolean isEditing​()
        Returns whether or not the active subwindow is currently editing a component.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the active subwindow exists and its selection is active.

      • abortEditing

        public void abortEditing​()
                  throws InvalidLabelException
        Terminate the current editing session, if any.
        Throws:
        InvalidLabelException - If the current label for the editing session is not a valid one for the selected component.

      • appendChar

        public void appendChar​(char c)
        Append the given char to the current edit session.
        Parameters:
        c - The char that is to be appended.

      • removeLastChar

        public void removeLastChar​()
        Removes the last char from the label of the active component.

      • getPaintBoard

        public PaintBoard getPaintBoard​()
        Returns the paint board associated with this diagram controller.

      • setPaintBoard

        public void setPaintBoard​(PaintBoard paintBoard)
        Set the paint board of this diagram controller to match the given one.
        Parameters:
        paintBoard - The new paint board for this controller.

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
